meanings.definition: In a generous or open-hearted manner
meanings.sent1: She smiled freeheartedly at everyone she met.
meanings.sent3: The puppy wagged its tail freeheartedly when it saw its owner.
meanings.sent4: The flowers bloomed freeheartedly under the warm sun.
meanings.sent5: The children sang freeheartedly during the school concert.

meanings.definition: With a lack of reservation or inhibition
meanings.sent1: She danced freeheartedly at the party, not caring who was watching.
meanings.sent2: He spoke his mind freeheartedly, without holding back.
meanings.sent3: The bird chirped freeheartedly, unaware of the looming storm.
meanings.sent4: The river flowed freeheartedly, unrestricted by the rocks in its path.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted freeheartedly, letting creativity guide every brushstroke.
